about_the_game:
Become a Great Wizard!
Become the hero mage that you always wanted to be with powerful spells at your fingertips!

Cast Spells in VR with hand gestures
Use VR controllers to destroy enemies by weaving magic into fire balls, ice balls, and other attacks. Defend yourself with magic spells to create barriers to protect you from the invading monsters.

  • Action-adventure VR spellcaster set in a rich fantasy world
  • Battle against many types of creatures; lava monsters, ice golems, and even dragons
  • Intuitive system of casting spells (both offensive and defensive) with hand gestures
  • Cast fire or ice spells from your staffs of fire and ice
  • Switch to fire and ice swords for close mele combat
  • Switch to fire and ice shields to block attacks
  • Free movement and/or teleportation-based exploration
  • Lots of configuration options so you can customize it to your play preferences

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: VR capable
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR

short_description: Become a powerful Wizard and defend your realm from invading monsters! Cast spells of fire and ice from your magic staffs using hand gestures. Be careful to use the opposite element in battle, as creatures can gain strength from their own element. Good Luck young Mage! Your people need you!
